member.name: T:FistCore.Core.MySql.MySqlConnectionProvider
member.summary: IConnectionProvider implementation for MySQL databases.
member.remarks: Refrain from using this class in your code. Always use interface instead. Only classes that implement interface should be aware of concrete IConnectionProvider implementation. ICatalog acts as a factory class for IConnectionProvider instances.

member.name: M:FistCore.Core.MySql.MySqlConnectionProvider.#ctor(FistCore.Core.DbmsType,System.String)
member.summary: Constructor. Sets DBMS type and connection string.
member.param: DBMS type to which this provider connects to. Only MySQL compatibile values are allowed.

member.name: M:FistCore.Core.MySql.MySqlConnectionProvider.#ctor(FistCore.Core.DbmsType,System.String,System.Data.IsolationLevel)
member.summary: Constructor. Sets DBMS type and connection string.
member.param: DBMS type to which this provider connects to. Only MySQL compatibile values are allowed.
Isolation level for transactions started by the parameterless method overload.

member.name: M:FistCore.Core.MySql.MySqlConnectionProvider.Dispose
member.summary: Releases the resources used by this object. Closes and disposes connection and transaction objects.

member.name: M:FistCore.Core.MySql.MySqlConnectionProvider.Dispose(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Releases the resources used by this object.

member.name: M:FistCore.Core.MySql.MySqlConnectionProvider.OpenConnection
member.summary: Opens the connection object. Throws exception if it's already open.

member.name: M:FistCore.Core.MySql.MySqlConnectionProvider.BeginTransaction
member.summary: Starts a new ADO.NET transaction using the open connection object of this class. Opens the connection if it isn't already open. No nesting allowed, throws exception if the transaction is already pending.

member.name: M:FistCore.Core.MySql.MySqlConnectionProvider.BeginTransaction(System.Data.IsolationLevel)
member.summary: Starts a new ADO.NET transaction using the open connection object of this class. Opens the connection if it isn't already open. No nesting allowed, throws exception if the transaction is already pending.

member.name: M:FistCore.Core.MySql.MySqlConnectionProvider.CommitTransaction
member.summary: Commits a pending transaction on the open connection object of this class. Throws exception if there is no pending transaction.

member.name: M:FistCore.Core.MySql.MySqlConnectionProvider.RollbackTransaction
member.summary: Rolls back a transaction from a pending state. Throws exception if there is no pending transaction.

member.name: M:FistCore.Core.MySql.MySqlConnectionProvider.CloseConnection
member.summary: Closes the connection to the database. This is the preferred method of closing any open connection.

remarks.para: The Close method rolls back any pending transactions. It then releases the connection to the connection pool, or closes the connection if connection pooling is disabled. It is a good practice to explicitly close connection immediately after it is no longer required.
Does nothing if the connection has already been closed.

member.name: M:FistCore.Core.MySql.MySqlConnectionProvider.CloseConnection(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Closes the open connection and commits or rollbacks transaction as specified. Does nothing if the connection has already been closed.
member.param: True will commit the current transaction, false will rollback the complete current transaction.

member.name: P:FistCore.Core.MySql.MySqlConnectionProvider.DBMS
member.summary: Gets the DBMS type this provider is working with.

member.name: P:FistCore.Core.MySql.MySqlConnectionProvider.IsTransactionPending
member.summary: Gets the value which indicates whether there is a pending transaction.

member.name: P:FistCore.Core.MySql.MySqlConnectionProvider.IsOpen
member.summary: Gets the value which indicates whether the connection is open.

member.name: P:FistCore.Core.MySql.MySqlConnectionProvider.Connection
member.summary: Gets the connection object.

member.name: P:FistCore.Core.MySql.MySqlConnectionProvider.Transaction
member.summary: Gets the transaction object.

member.name: M:FistCore.Core.MySql.MySqlInserter.RenderInsert(FistCore.Core.InsertStatement,FistCore.Core.DbParameter,FistCore.Core.DbmsType,System.Text.StringBuilder,FistCore.Core.DbParameterCollection)
member.summary: Renders INSERT statement.
member.param: INSERT statement that is being rendered.
StringBuilder to which the SQL code is appended.
SQL parameter collection to which the object's and its children's parameters are added. After the rendering is done the collection contains all parameters with unique names.
member.returns: null because automatically generated ID must be fetched via SELECT after INSERT.

member.name: M:FistCore.Core.MySql.MySqlInserter.Execute(FistCore.Core.InsertStatement,FistCore.Core.DbmsType,FistCore.Core.IConnectionProvider,FistCore.Core.CommandExecutionStatistics@,System.Int32)
member.summary: Executes the INSERT command. Automatically generates the code that retrieves the new identity for the supported databases. DBMS specific code depends on the DBMS property of the used ConnectionProvider.
member.param: Output parameter: statistic for executed command.
member.returns: Automatically generated ID for inserted row, or null if ID is not automatically generated.
